title: Kagami no Naka no Yami
sinopse:
Story 1: Natsumi always sees an apparition of a monk in her house that scared her. One day a shadow holding a scythe started to follow and target her.

Story 2: Ever since she was a kid, Hayasaka Rumi always have a hunch when something dangerous about to happen to her. Her gradma said that those hunch is an ability that is granted to each 1st child of Hayasaka family by a tengu.

Story 3: Lately Kumiko often have a strange and sad dream about someone who was crying and called out to her.

Story 4: Tokiko lived in a town that is known for it's ski resort but for some unknown reason this year winter haven't come yet.
